verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> And it came to pass כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> when זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2204><s%> was old יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> that when Isaac וַתִּכְהֶ֥יןָ <S%H3543><s%> were dim עֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> and his eyes מֵרְאֹ֑ת <S%H7200><s%> so that he could not see וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> he called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֵשָׂ֣ו ׀ <S%H6215><s%> Esau בְּנ֣וֹ <S%H1121><s%> son הַגָּדֹ֗ל <S%H1419><s%> his eldest וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him בְּנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> unto him My son וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2009><s%> Here

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> now זָקַ֑נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> Behold now I am old לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> I know י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> not the day מוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H4194><s%> of my death

וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now שָׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> Now therefore take נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please כֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H3627><s%> I pray thee thy weapons תֶּלְיְךָ֖ <S%H8522><s%> thy quiver וְקַשְׁתֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7198><s%> and thy bow וְצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> and go out הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> to the field וְצ֥וּדָה <S%H6679><s%> and take לִּ֖י [צֵידָה כ] (צָֽיִד׃ <S%H6720><s%> meat ק)

וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> And make לִ֨י מַטְעַמִּ֜ים <S%H4303><s%> me savoury meat כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> such as אָהַ֛בְתִּי <S%H157><s%> I love וְהָבִ֥יאָה <S%H935><s%> and bring לִּ֖י וְאֹכֵ֑לָה <S%H398><s%> [it] to me that I may eat בַּעֲב֛וּר <S%H5668><s%> so תְּבָרֶכְךָ֥ <S%H1288><s%> may bless נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> that my soul בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> thee before אָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> I die

וְרִבְקָ֣ה <S%H7259><s%> And Rebekah שֹׁמַ֔עַת <S%H8085><s%> heard בְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יִצְחָ֔ק <S%H3327><s%> when Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> to Esau בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> And Esau הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> to the field לָצ֥וּד <S%H6679><s%> to hunt צַ֖יִד <S%H6718><s%> [for] venison לְהָבִֽיא׃ <S%H935><s%> [and] to bring

וְרִבְקָה֙ <S%H7259><s%> And Rebekah אָֽמְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob בְּנָ֖הּ <S%H1121><s%> her son לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> Behold I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father מְדַבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֵשָׂ֥ו <S%H6215><s%> unto Esau אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הָבִ֨יאָה <S%H935><s%> Bring לִּ֥י צַ֛יִד <S%H6718><s%> me venison וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and make לִ֥י מַטְעַמִּ֖ים <S%H4303><s%> me savoury meat וְאֹכֵ֑לָה <S%H398><s%> that I may eat וַאֲבָרֶכְכָ֛ה <S%H1288><s%> and bless לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> thee before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מוֹתִֽי׃ <S%H4194><s%> my death

וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Now therefore my son שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> obey בְּקֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> my voice לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> according to that which אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I מְצַוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> I command אֹתָֽךְ׃ <S%H853><s%>

לֶךְ־ <S%H1980><s%> Go נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> now אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> now to the flock וְקַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> and fetch לִ֣י מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there שְׁנֵ֛י <S%H8147><s%> me from thence two גְּדָיֵ֥י <S%H1423><s%> kids עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats טֹבִ֑ים <S%H2896><s%> good וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> and I will make אֹתָ֧ם <S%H853><s%> מַטְעַמִּ֛ים <S%H4303><s%> them savoury meat לְאָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> for thy father כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he אָהֵֽב׃ <S%H157><s%> such as he loveth

וְהֵבֵאתָ֥ <S%H935><s%> And thou shalt bring לְאָבִ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> [it] to thy father וְאָכָ֑ל <S%H398><s%> that he may eat בַּעֲבֻ֛ר <S%H5668><s%> so אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> and that יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> he may bless לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> thee before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4194><s%> his death

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about רִבְקָ֖ה <S%H7259><s%> to Rebekah אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> his mother הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold עֵשָׂ֤ו <S%H6215><s%> Behold Esau אָחִי֙ <S%H251><s%> my brother אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man שָׂעִ֔ר <S%H8163><s%> [is] a hairy וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man חָלָֽק׃ <S%H2509><s%> and I [am] a smooth

אוּלַ֤י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps יְמֻשֵּׁ֙נִי֙ <S%H4959><s%> peradventure will feel אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> My father וְהָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become בְעֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> me and I shall seem כִּמְתַעְתֵּ֑עַ <S%H8591><s%> to him as a deceiver וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <S%H935><s%> and I shall bring עָלַ֛י <S%H5921><s%> upon קְלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> a curse וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not בְרָכָֽה׃ <S%H1293><s%> upon me and not a blessing

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> And his mother עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> unto קִלְלָתְךָ֖ <S%H7045><s%> unto him Upon me [be] thy curse בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> my son אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> only שְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> only obey בְּקֹלִ֖י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וְלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and go קַֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> fetch לִֽי׃

וַיֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיִּקַּ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> and fetched וַיָּבֵ֖א <S%H935><s%> and brought לְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> [them] to his mother וַתַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> made אִמּוֹ֙ <S%H517><s%> and his mother מַטְעַמִּ֔ים <S%H4303><s%> savoury meat כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after אָהֵ֥ב <S%H157><s%> loved אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> such as his father

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> took רִ֠בְקָה <S%H7259><s%> And Rebekah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֨י <S%H899><s%> raiment עֵשָׂ֜ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau בְּנָ֤הּ <S%H1121><s%> son הַגָּדֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> of her eldest הַחֲמֻדֹ֔ת <S%H2532><s%> goodly אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which אִתָּ֖הּ <S%H854><s%> her in בַּבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> which [were] with her in the house וַתַּלְבֵּ֥שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and put them upon אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob בְּנָ֥הּ <S%H1121><s%> son הַקָּטָֽן׃ <S%H6996><s%> her younger

וְאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> עֹרֹת֙ <S%H5785><s%> the skins גְּדָיֵ֣י <S%H1423><s%> of the kids הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats הִלְבִּ֖ישָׁה <S%H3847><s%> And she put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יָדָ֑יו <S%H3027><s%> upon his hands וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and on חֶלְקַ֥ת <S%H2513><s%> and upon the smooth צַוָּארָֽיו׃ <S%H6677><s%> of his neck

וַתִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> And she gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּטְעַמִּ֛ים <S%H4303><s%> the savoury meat וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלֶּ֖חֶם <S%H3899><s%> and the bread אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֑תָה <S%H6213><s%> which she had prepared בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob בְּנָֽהּ׃ <S%H1121><s%> of her son

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> And he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> My father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and he said הִנֶּ֔נִּי <S%H2009><s%> Here מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> I am Who אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you בְּנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father אָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> I [am] Esau בְּכֹרֶ֔ךָ <S%H1060><s%> thy firstborn עָשִׂ֕יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have done כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> according as thou badest אֵלָ֑י <S%H413><s%> about קֽוּם־ <S%H6965><s%> me arise נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please שְׁבָ֗ה <S%H3427><s%> I pray thee sit וְאָכְלָה֙ <S%H398><s%> and eat מִצֵּידִ֔י <S%H6718><s%> of my venison בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> that תְּבָרֲכַ֥נִּי <S%H1288><s%> may bless נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> that thy soul

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> unto his son מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How זֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> he מִהַ֥רְתָּ <S%H4116><s%> [it] so quickly לִמְצֹ֖א <S%H4672><s%> How [is it] that thou hast found בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> to his son וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because הִקְרָ֛ה <S%H7136><s%> brought יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Because the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> [it] to me

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יִצְחָק֙ <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> unto Jacob גְּשָׁה־ <S%H5066><s%> Come near נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please וַאֲמֻֽשְׁךָ֖ <S%H4184><s%> I pray thee that I may feel בְּנִ֑י <S%H1121><s%> thee my son הַֽאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> whether thou [be] my very בְּנִ֥י <S%H1121><s%> son עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> not

וַיִּגַּ֧שׁ <S%H5066><s%> went near יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> And Jacob אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> unto Isaac אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיְמֻשֵּׁ֑הוּ <S%H4959><s%> and he felt וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said הַקֹּל֙ <S%H6963><s%> The voice ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> [is] Jacob's וְהַיָּדַ֖יִם <S%H3027><s%> but the hands יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> [are] the hands עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> of Esau

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִכִּיר֔וֹ <S%H5234><s%> And he discerned כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become יָדָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> him not because his hands כִּידֵ֛י <S%H3027><s%> hands עֵשָׂ֥ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau's אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> as his brother שְׂעִרֹ֑ת <S%H8163><s%> were hairy וַֽיְבָרְכֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H1288><s%> so he blessed

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> are you זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> really בְּנִ֣י <S%H1121><s%> [Art] thou my very son עֵשָׂ֑ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> he

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הַגִּ֤שָׁה <S%H5066><s%> Bring [it] near לִּי֙ וְאֹֽכְלָה֙ <S%H398><s%> to me and I will eat מִצֵּ֣יד <S%H6718><s%> venison בְּנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> of my son's לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of תְּבָֽרֶכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> may bless נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> that my soul וַיַּגֶּשׁ־ <S%H5066><s%> thee And he brought [it] near לוֹ֙ וַיֹּאכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> to him and he did eat וַיָּ֧בֵא <S%H935><s%> and he brought ל֦וֹ יַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> him wine וַיֵּֽשְׁתְּ׃ <S%H8354><s%> and he drank

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> And his father גְּשָׁה־ <S%H5066><s%> unto him Come near נָּ֥א <S%H4994><s%> Please וּשְׁקָה־ <S%H5401><s%> now and kiss לִּ֖י בְּנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> me my son

וַיִּגַּשׁ֙ <S%H5066><s%> And he came near וַיִּשַּׁק־ <S%H5401><s%> and kissed ל֔וֹ וַיָּ֛רַח <S%H7306><s%> him and he smelled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> the smell בְּגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> of his raiment וַֽיְבָרֲכֵ֑הוּ <S%H1288><s%> and blessed וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and said רְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> See רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> the smell בְּנִ֔י <S%H1121><s%> of my son כְּרֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> [is] as the smell שָׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> of a field אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which בֵּרֲכ֖וֹ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD

וְיִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> give לְךָ֙ הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> Therefore God מִטַּל֙ <S%H2919><s%> thee of the dew הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וּמִשְׁמַנֵּ֖י <S%H4924><s%> and the fatness הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> and plenty דָּגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> of corn וְתִירֹֽשׁ׃ <S%H8492><s%> and wine

יַֽעַבְד֣וּךָ <S%H5647><s%> serve עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> Let people [וְיִשְׁתַּחוּ כ] (וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֤וּ <S%H7812><s%> bow ק) לְךָ֙ לְאֻמִּ֔ים <S%H3816><s%> thee and nations הֱוֵ֤ה <S%H1933><s%> to thee be גְבִיר֙ <S%H1376><s%> lord לְאַחֶ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> over thy brethren וְיִשְׁתַּחֲוּ֥וּ <S%H7812><s%> bow down לְךָ֖ בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אִמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H517><s%> and let thy mother's אֹרְרֶ֣יךָ <S%H779><s%> to thee cursed אָר֔וּר <S%H779><s%> [be] every one that curseth וּֽמְבָרֲכֶ֖יךָ <S%H1288><s%> thee and blessed בָּרֽוּךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> [be] he that blesseth

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after כִּלָּ֣ה <S%H3615><s%> had made an end יִצְחָק֮ <S%H3327><s%> And it came to pass as soon as Isaac לְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> of blessing אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹב֒ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַ֣ךְ <S%H389><s%> was yet יָצֹ֤א <S%H3318><s%> scarce יָצָא֙ <S%H3318><s%> gone out יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from the presence יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> of Isaac אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְעֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> that Esau אָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> his brother בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> came in מִצֵּידֽוֹ׃ <S%H6718><s%> from his hunting

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he also had made גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he מַטְעַמִּ֔ים <S%H4303><s%> savoury meat וַיָּבֵ֖א <S%H935><s%> and brought it לְאָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְאָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father יָקֻ֤ם <S%H6965><s%> arise אָבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> Let my father וְיֹאכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> and eat מִצֵּ֣יד <S%H6718><s%> venison בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> of his son's בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> that תְּבָרֲכַ֥נִּי <S%H1288><s%> may bless נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> that thy soul

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said ל֛וֹ יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> and he וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him Who [art] thou? And he said אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I am בִּנְךָ֥ <S%H1121><s%> I [am] thy son בְכֹֽרְךָ֖ <S%H1060><s%> thy firstborn עֵשָֽׂו׃ <S%H6215><s%> Esau

וַיֶּחֱרַ֨ד <S%H2729><s%> trembled יִצְחָ֣ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac חֲרָדָה֮ <S%H2731><s%> fear גְּדֹלָ֣ה <S%H1419><s%> very עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מְאֹד֒ <S%H3966><s%> diligently וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אֵפ֡וֹא <S%H645><s%> Who? where ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> that הַצָּֽד־ <S%H6679><s%> [is] he that hath taken צַיִד֩ <S%H6718><s%> venison וַיָּ֨בֵא <S%H935><s%> and brought לִ֜י וָאֹכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> [it] me and I have eaten מִכֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> of all בְּטֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before תָּב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> of all before thou camest וָאֲבָרֲכֵ֑הוּ <S%H1288><s%> and have blessed גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Yes בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> him? yea [and] he shall be blessed יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

כִּשְׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> And when Esau אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> the words אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> of his father וַיִּצְעַ֣ק <S%H6817><s%> he cried צְעָקָ֔ה <S%H6818><s%> cry גְּדֹלָ֥ה <S%H1419><s%> with a great וּמָרָ֖ה <S%H4751><s%> bitter עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> with מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and exceeding וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְאָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father בָּרֲכֵ֥נִי <S%H1288><s%> Bless גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָ֖נִי <S%H589><s%> I אָבִֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> me [even] me also O my father

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> came אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> Thy brother בְּמִרְמָ֑ה <S%H4820><s%> with subtilty וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> and hath taken away בִּרְכָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1293><s%> thy blessing

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הֲכִי֩ <S%H3588><s%> Is not he rightly קָרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> bewray שְׁמ֜וֹ <S%H8034><s%> base יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob וַֽיַּעְקְבֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H6117><s%> has supplanted זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> these פַעֲמַ֔יִם <S%H6471><s%> two times אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּכֹרָתִ֣י <S%H1062><s%> my birthright לָקָ֔ח <S%H3947><s%> he took away וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now לָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> and behold now he hath taken away בִּרְכָתִ֑י <S%H1293><s%> my blessing וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> And he said הֲלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָצַ֥לְתָּ <S%H680><s%> Hast thou not reserved לִּ֖י בְּרָכָֽה׃ <S%H1293><s%> a blessing

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered יִצְחָ֜ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לְעֵשָׂ֗ו <S%H6215><s%> unto Esau הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold גְּבִ֞יר <S%H1376><s%> him thy lord שַׂמְתִּ֥יו <S%H7760><s%> Behold I have made לָךְ֙ וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֶחָ֗יו <S%H251><s%> and all his brethren נָתַ֤תִּי <S%H5414><s%> have I given לוֹ֙ לַעֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> to him for servants וְדָגָ֥ן <S%H1715><s%> and with corn וְתִירֹ֖שׁ <S%H8492><s%> and wine סְמַכְתִּ֑יו <S%H5564><s%> have I sustained וּלְכָ֣ה אֵפ֔וֹא <S%H645><s%> now מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> him and what shall I do בְּנִֽי׃ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עֵשָׂ֜ו <S%H6215><s%> And Esau אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to his אָבִ֗יו <S%H1><s%> unto his father הַֽבְרָכָ֨ה <S%H1293><s%> blessing אַחַ֤ת <S%H259><s%> Hast thou but one הִֽוא־ <S%H1931><s%> he לְךָ֙ אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> me [even] me also O my father בָּרֲכֵ֥נִי <S%H1288><s%> abundantly גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָ֖נִי <S%H589><s%> I אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> to his father וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> lifted up עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> And Esau קֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וַיֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> and wept

וַיַּ֛עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered יִצְחָ֥ק <S%H3327><s%> And Isaac אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֑יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּ֞ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold מִשְׁמַנֵּ֤י <S%H4924><s%> shall be the fatness הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the earth יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become מֽוֹשָׁבֶ֔ךָ <S%H4186><s%> unto him Behold thy dwelling וּמִטַּ֥ל <S%H2919><s%> and of the dew הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven מֵעָֽל׃ <S%H5921><s%> above

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> By חַרְבְּךָ֣ <S%H2719><s%> And by thy sword תִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> shalt thou live וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother תַּעֲבֹ֑ד <S%H5647><s%> and shalt serve וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> shall come כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you תָּרִ֔יד <S%H7300><s%> and it shall come to pass when thou shalt have the dominion וּפָרַקְתָּ֥ <S%H6561><s%> that thou shalt break עֻלּ֖וֹ <S%H5923><s%> his yoke מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from צַוָּארֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6677><s%> from off thy neck

וַיִּשְׂטֹ֤ם <S%H7852><s%> hated עֵשָׂו֙ <S%H6215><s%> And Esau אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הַ֨בְּרָכָ֔ה <S%H1293><s%> of the blessing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> wherewith בֵּרֲכ֖וֹ <S%H1288><s%> blessed him אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said עֵשָׂ֜ו <S%H6215><s%> and Esau בְּלִבּ֗וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart יִקְרְבוּ֙ <S%H7126><s%> are at hand יְמֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> The days אֵ֣בֶל <S%H60><s%> of mourning אָבִ֔י <S%H1><s%> for my father וְאַֽהַרְגָ֖ה <S%H2026><s%> then will I slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יַעֲקֹ֥ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob אָחִֽי׃ <S%H251><s%> my brother

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> were told לְרִבְקָ֔ה <S%H7259><s%> to Rebekah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> And these words עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> of Esau בְּנָ֣הּ <S%H1121><s%> son הַגָּדֹ֑ל <S%H1419><s%> her elder וַתִּשְׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> and she sent וַתִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> and called לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> Jacob בְּנָ֣הּ <S%H1121><s%> son הַקָּטָ֔ן <S%H6996><s%> her younger וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> Esau אָחִ֔יךָ <S%H251><s%> unto him Behold thy brother מִתְנַחֵ֥ם <S%H5162><s%> as touching thee doth comfort לְךָ֖ לְהָרְגֶֽךָ׃ <S%H2026><s%> himself [purposing] to kill

וְעַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בְנִ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Now therefore my son שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> obey בְּקֹלִ֑י <S%H6963><s%> my voice וְק֧וּם <S%H6965><s%> and arise בְּרַח־ <S%H1272><s%> flee לְךָ֛ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about לָבָ֥ן <S%H3837><s%> thou to Laban אָחִ֖י <S%H251><s%> my brother חָרָֽנָה׃ <S%H2771><s%> to Haran
